id.description: Unique identifier for the custom object

locationId.description: The location ID where the custom object belongs

schema.description: JSON schema definition for the custom object

displayField.description: Field to use as display name for records

enableApiAccess.description: Whether API access is enabled for this object

recordCount.description: Total number of records in this custom object

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the custom object was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the custom object was last updated

createdBy.description: User who created the custom object
